name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify Theme Detector by PageFly Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify Theme Detector by PageFly Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify Theme Detector by PageFly Extension. Detect Shopify Themes Instantly. 

This extension helps you quickly identify and inspect any Shopify theme, including customized ones from the official Shopify theme store.

🚀 Key Features:
➜ Identify Shopify Themes: Instantly detect any Shopify theme, including custom modifications.
➜ Non-Shopify Store Alerts: Get notified if a store isn’t using Shopify.
➜ User-Friendly: No coding skills required—just install, enable, and start detecting.

🚀 How to Use:
➜ Install the Extension: Add the Shopify Theme Detector to your browser.
➜ Activate: Click on the extension in your browser’s toolbar.
➜ Detect: Get your theme report in just a few seconds.

🚀 Who Is It For?
➜ This tool is perfect for Shopify merchants, developers, and anyone interested in Shopify themes. No technical expertise is necessary—just install and use.

🚀 Privacy Practices:
➜ The Shopify Theme Detector by PageFly respects your privacy. We collect and use your data as follows:
➜ User Activity: This includes network monitoring, clicks, mouse positions, scroll actions, and keystrokes.
➜ Website Content: This includes text, images, sounds, videos, and hyperlinks.
For more detailed information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

🚀 Feedback and Support:
Have questions or suggestions? Contact us at happytohelp@pagefly.io with the subject line: “Shopify Theme Detector Questions.” We typically respond within 24–48 hours.
